meanings.def: the act of adopting a child; the fact of being adopted
examples: She put the baby up for adoption.
The number of adoptions has fallen markedly since the 1970s.
adoption into something his adoption into an American family
They were so happy when the adoption went through successfully.
When will the child be available for adoption?

meanings.def: the decision to start using something such as an idea, a plan or a name
examples: The widespread adoption of new information technology could save $162 billion a year.
The committee recommended the adoption of new safety procedures.

meanings.def: the act of choosing somebody as a candidate for an election
examples: his adoption as the Labour candidate
The party announced the formal adoption of George Smith as their election candidate.
